lines.text:
[Reading Khmyr's child's letter]
Dear dad! When mom and I found out that you were in jail, we got very excited. And mom also got very excited because we thought you were dead. Mom kept telling me that you were a test pilot.
He's a thief pilot, stole everybody's money and blamed it on a cab driver.
I'm an animal. Stole the money from children. Robbed the preschool.
When you were mixing gasoline with donkey urine at your gas station, weren't you an animal then?
That was gasoline. And these are children.
Trrrr. I guess there are snakes here.
